title: (x) M&M Transport logo - Quaint Gothic (Desdemona) {Adriano S}
content:
Boy, this is frustrating. I _know_ I’ve seen this somewhere before, but damned if I can find it now. It’s the font for ’Transport’ in the logo below.

Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mmtransport.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706171743/http:/typophile.com/files/mmtransport.jpg) | 12.67 KB |

 [‹ (x) Hughes Family Chiropractic italic face - ITC Giovanni {Brett Jordan}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706171743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37747 "Go to previous forum topic") [Lettering on vintage French posters (1900) ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706171743/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37756 "Go to next forum topic")
author: iskippy227

comments.content:
A-ha! That’s the one! And I know why it was frustrating me so much: I’ve seen it going through my font menu on my _home_ computer, but it’s not installed (yet) on my _work_ computer.

Much appreciated!
